t: Amazon Puts Its Own “Brands” First Above Better-Rated Products – The Markup

An animation showing two similar products sold on Amazon and the symbolic process for how Amazon determines which product to display first. It starts with the two products on podiums side-by-side. First, it shows that the non-Amazon product has a higher average product rating, which is illustrated by star icons raining on the products and the non-Amazon product being raised higher on its podium.
